General.Name: PKP Cargo S.A.
General.Description: Pkp Cargo S.A. engages in the transport of goods and the provision of logistics services in the field of rail freight in Poland and internationally. The company offers railway transportation and related services for coal, coke, aggregates, construction materials, metallurgical products, liquid fuels or chemicals, timber and crops, chemicals, liquid fuels, metals and ores, and automotive products. It also provides intermodal transportation services, such as transport of containers through various means of transport, including train, ship, and car; operates 25 handling terminals, 2 logistics centers, 5 container terminals that offers handling, forwarding, storage, and packaging services; and provides railway, road, sea, and air forwarding services. In addition, it offers railway siding operation services, and diagnostics and maintenance of railway siding infrastructure; and maintains, upgrades, and repairs rolling stock items. Further, the company involved in the transport of goods; trading of coal; physical decommissioning of wagons and locomotives, and repair of electrical machines and wheelsets, as well as weighing and adjustment of rolling stock; collection, processing, and disposal of waste and recovery of raw materials; and cleaning of railway and car tanks. Additionally, it provides border and fleet management services; and engages in the civil engineering activities, including management and revitalization of post-industrial areas consisting of mining, demolition works, management of waste treatment facilities, liquidation, excavations, and soil decontamination, etc. The company serves mining and metal processing, construction, chemicals, timber, food, and automotive industries. Pkp Cargo S.A. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Warsaw, Poland.
